name: Sleuth
ability: You start knowing how many steps away your closest evil neighbor is.

name: Babysitter
ability: You start knowing a player and their alignment. If you speak privately without them then you die that night.

name: Informer
ability: Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to ask whether an ongoing private conversation contains an evil player.

name: Enchantress
ability: Each night, each player you spoke privately to today is safe from the Demon.

name: Apopheniac
ability: Each night, choose a player: get a code word. Good players' words have something in common that evil players' words don't.

name: Phantasmatographer
ability: Each night*, learn how many evil players had private one-on-one conversations today.

name: Teacher
ability: Each night*, you learn if the Demon remained seated today.

name: Psychologist
ability: Each night*, you learn whether you spoke privately with an good player today.

name: Scaredy-cat
ability: Each night*, if you spoke privately with an evil player today, you die. You are safe from the Demon.

name: Diviner
ability: Once per game, during the day, privately ask the Storyteller the number of living evil players.

name: Mystic
ability: Once per game, during the day, privately ask the Storyteller how many seated players are evil.

name: Spellbinder
ability: The 1st time you speak privately with the Demon, they are drunk until dawn.

name: Loon
ability: You think you are an Outsider, but your abilities malfunction. You can't die at night.

name: Sleepy Guard
ability: Evil Demons and evil Minions wake together.

name: Polymath
ability: If you would die, instead you become evil & swap characters with a living Townsfolk.

name: Bartender
ability: While you are seated, your 2 seated living Townsfolk neighbors are drunk.

name: Ascetic
ability: Each night*, if you spoke privately with a player today, you might die.

name: Diabolist
ability: Each day, if you spoke privately to the Demon, they are safe from execution. Lose this ability when only 3 players are alive.

name: Plaguebringer
ability: Each day, each player you speak privately to is poisoned until dawn.

name: Darkglare
ability: Each night, choose a player: they learn you chose them. If they don't remain seated tomorrow, they die that night.

name: Overseer
ability: Each night, choose a player: learn their character. While seated, your two neighbors register as evil.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ Azazel points to a player. If they target themselves they die then show them their new character if they spoke to 1 player today. (zzz) Then wake the other player and show them that they are now Azazel. Otherwise, the chosen player dies. ‚óØ
name: Azazel
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you die and had 1 one-on-one talk today, swap roles with them & they become evil.

otherNightReminder: Ô∏ñ If the Seductress spoke to any players privately, they die. ‚óØ
name: Seductress
ability: Each night*, each good player you spoke privately to today dies. If you spoke to none, you win.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Fallen points to a player. (zzz) The chosen player dies. ‚óØÔ∏ñ If The Fallen spoke to a player privately, üëÅ wake that player. Show the "You are" card, then the hand sign thumb-down "evil". (zzz) ‚óØ
name: The Fallen
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Each night*, the first player you spoke privately to today becomes evil. [No minions]

otherNightReminder: üëÅ Blacktongue points to a player. (zzz) The chosen player dies. ‚óØ
name: Blacktongue
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players: the first dies. If you spoke privately today with any players you chose last night, they die.

firstNightReminder: This should never be in the Grimoire, so you shouldn't be seeing this.
otherNightReminder: This should never be in the Grimoire, so you shouldn't be seeing this.
name: Azazel
ability: Not a Demon, just appearance #2 of Azazel on the night order.
